variant.question: Which of the following is true with reference to frequency of a radio wave?

options.text: Frequency is the number of cycles in one second in a radio wave expressed in Hertz (Hz)
Frequency is the length of a radio wave expressed as an angle
Frequency is the minimum number of cycles occurring in one minute in a radio wave expressed in Hertz (Hz)
Frequency is the maximum deflection in a radio wave expressed in Hertz (Hz)
